attributes.additional_details: This e petition is for the government to reform the age of consent, so that people underage will find the law is more on their side when is comes to people over the age of consent, who wants to go out with them. The age of consent for example needs to be increased to 18 from 16, and there has to be tougher sentences for pedophiles. These pedophiles need to be locked up with longer prison sentences. Also the government needs to bring back the death penalty for pedophiles.
